value.title: Artificial Intelligence Glossary: Neural Networks and Other Terms Explained
value.excerpt: Neural network: A mathematical system, modeled on the human brain, that learns skills by finding statistical patterns in data. It consists of layers of artificial neurons: The first layer receives the input data, and the last layer outputs the results.
